name: Full-Stack Development
detail: Building dynamic, scalable web applications with a seamless integration of front-end and back-end technologies. Skilled in crafting user-friendly interfaces while ensuring robust server-side performance.

name: UI/UX Development
detail: Designing engaging and intuitive user interfaces with a deep understanding of the user's needs. Focused on creating aesthetically pleasing and functional designs that enhance the overall experience.

name: 3D & Interactive Web Development
detail: Creating stunning 3D visuals and interactive web experiences that push the boundaries of digital design. Expert in building immersive environments and animations for the web using advanced WebGL techniques.

name: Project Management & Problem-Solving
detail: Effectively managing projects from start to finish, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality results. Adept at solving complex problems and optimizing workflows for maximum efficiency.

name: API & Database Design
detail: Designing powerful, scalable APIs and databases that support seamless data flow and ensure high performance. Experienced in building systems that are both robust and efficient.

name: Others
detail: Other computer skills to enhance my overall workflow as well as stay creative, Also learnt to explore more into the technical world
